alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 02 at 4:05AM MST until December 03 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible in Northern El Paso County along and West of Interstate 25. West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible in Teller County. * WHERE...Northern El Paso County along and west of Interstate 25 as well as Teller County and the Rampart Range. * WHEN...From this evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
